targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "lma_components_threads" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_read" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_write" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_syst" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_user" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'hekad' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT derivative(first(value),1s) FROM "hekad_msg_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'decoder' AND $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hekad_msg_avg_duration" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'decoder' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hekad_memory" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'decoder' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)

SELECT derivative(first(value),1s) FROM "hekad_msg_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'filter' AND $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hekad_msg_avg_duration" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'filter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hekad_memory" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'filter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)

SELECT derivative(first(value),1s) AS "first(value),1s" FROM "hekad_timer_event_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'filter' AND $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hekad_timer_event_avg_duration" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "type" = 'filter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "lma_components_threads" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_read" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_write" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_syst" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_user" WHERE "hostname" = '$node' AND "service" = 'collectd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: node
list.query: show tag values from lma_components_threads with key = "hostname" where environment_label = '$environment'
